titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at St. Catharine Cree-Church, on the 26th of November, 1691 being the thanksgiving-day, for the preservation of the King, and the reduction of Ireland / by Nicholas Brady ... ; printed at the request of his parishioners.
titleStmt.author: Brady, Nicholas, 1659-1726.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
